text.p:
“ Nuair a bha mi an teis - meadhon ‘ Greas ort ’ , chuala mi cuideachd an taighe aig an doras . Dh ’ éigh a ’ chailleach , is trì chinn theine oirre ,
‘ Oh ! Mary , Mary ! What - an - a - smell , What - an - a - smell ! ’
( seo mar a thog i fhéin e ) .
‘ Open the windows , open the windows ! ’
Thuirt mise ,
‘ What - an - a - smell – ach sgadan ùr for your tea . ’
